name: gesture-dock
description: Control your browser with hand gestures using your webcam.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && parcel build src/ui/options.html src/ui/popup.html src/core/background.js src/ui/offscreen.html --dist-dir dist --no-content-hash && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r icons dist/ && mkdir -p dist/core && cp -r src/core/model dist/core
